name: Bouncing Dancer Girls!
description:
Bouncing Dancer Girls, the name says all.

A rhythm game about dancing girls with boobs physics. This game exists just for representing a word in Spanish "rebotes", bounce in English. (and also because I like boobs)

My friend Paco also has made a "bouncing" game (Without boobs):  https://isaacdeveloper.itch.io/the-square

This game was made to be a minimum viable product/prototype, if the game likes you, please, leave feedback and make me know in the comments below, in that case I will make a full game.

(If certain YouTube video gets certain like count, there will be an eroge version)

Our invited waifu's game: https://swjcstudios.itch.io/academy-z-beginning-of-catastrophy 

Thumbnail Photo : https://www.pexels.com/es-es/foto/actividad-activo-alegria-alto-40815/   https://www.instagram.com/jillwellingtonphotography_/
